survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Stylist Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal stylist apps to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify key features, and uncover areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?
answer_options: This is my first time using one
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?
answer_options: This is my first time using one

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in your AI-powered personal stylist app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Ensure the list covers common features.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in your AI-powered personal stylist app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of outfit recommendations provided by the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of outfit recommendations provided by the app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI-powered personal stylist app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI-powered personal stylist app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered personal stylist app to others?
answer_options: No, I would not recommend it
